attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BANKS HAVE INCREASED THE AMOUNT THEY CHARGE FOR balances,how are they helping with the current economic situation by charging upto 29.99 per cent i.e citi cards.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
